video_prompt: A wizard's staff crackles with electric blue energy, illuminating his serious face as mist swirls around ancient ruins. Small orange flames flicker on the ground as he stands amidst gnarled roots. His tattered cloak billows softly.
image_prompt: A full-body portrait of a male wizard in dark, gold-trimmed attire and a pointed hat, holding a glowing electric blue staff. He stands in a misty outdoor setting with ancient stone ruins and subtle flickering orange flames on the ground. Dark, serious expression.
refined_video_prompt: Electric blue energy crackles along a wizard's staff, its dynamic light shifting across his serious face. Mist swirls through ancient ruins in the background. Small orange flames flicker on the ground. His tattered cloak billows gently.
